user_input:
Please create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. Use Hydrogen as the complement not the carrier
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. Do not access any PLEXOS database. Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 for scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050 with nodes split and Hydrogen treated as the complement (not the carrier), then export to TST format.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using NT, NT_HE, NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050. Split nodes. Treat Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Generate hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios NT, NT_HE, and NT_LE for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050 with nodes split and Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier), without accessing any PLEXOS database.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', determine scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'], years [2030,2035,2040,2050], ensure nodes are split, and set Hydrogen as the complement (not the carrier). Avoid any PLEXOS DB access.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly Hybrid Heat Pump demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 to TST format with carrier set to 'Hybrid Heat Pump'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', export the outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' into TST format with carrier 'Hybrid Heat Pump'.
